## Solution 1

```vba
Sub HeaderFormat()
    With Worksheets("Sheet1").Range("A1:E1")
        .Font.Bold = True
        .Interior.Color = RGB(37, 150, 190)
        .Font.Color = vbWhite
    End With
End Sub
```

## Solution 2

```vba
Sub GreetUser()
    Dim name As String
    name = InputBox("Your name?")
    If Len(name) > 0 Then MsgBox "Welcome, " & name
End Sub
```

## Solution 3

```vba
Sub FillColumn()
    Dim i As Long
    For i = 1 To 50
        Cells(i, 1).Value = i
    Next i
End Sub
```
